name: Golf Club Nostalgia- Main Theme
detailed_description: Receive the main theme of the game for free, available to use on your mobile phone or anywhere you would like! If you enjoy the gift, please consider following our publisher page.
about_the_game: Receive the main theme of the game for free, available to use on your mobile phone or anywhere you would like! If you enjoy the gift, please consider following our publisher page.
short_description: Receive the main theme of the game for free, available to use on your mobile phone or anywhere you would like! If you enjoy the gift, please consider following our publisher page.
supported_languages:
English*, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, French, German, Polish, Japanese, Korean
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Intel Quad Core
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 750M, 2 GB Memory
  • Storage: 15 MB available space
